subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson became the 12th major league player to hit three home runs in the first four innings of a game, as he finished the night 5 for 5 in the Yankees’ victory.
snippet: Curtis Granderson became the 12th major league player to hit three home runs in the first four innings of a game, as he finished the night 5 for 5 in the Yankees’ victory.
